verses.verse: וַיְהִ֗י <WH1961> become כִּשְׁמֹ֙עַ֙ <WH8085> heard הַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> And it came to pass when king חִזְקִיָּ֔הוּ <WH2396> Hezekiah וַיִּקְרַ֖ע <WH7167> [it] that he rent אֶת־ <WH853> בְּגָדָ֑יו <WH899> his clothes וַיִּתְכַּ֣ס <WH3680> and covered בַּשָּׂ֔ק <WH8242> himself with sackcloth וַיָּבֹ֖א <WH935> and went בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> into the house יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> of the LORD

וַ֠יִּשְׁלַח <WH7971> And he sent אֶת־ <WH853> אֶלְיָקִ֨ים <WH471> Eliakim אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who עַל־ <WH5921> was over הַבַּ֜יִת <WH1004> which [was] over the household וְשֶׁבְנָ֣א <WH7644> and Shebna הַסֹּפֵ֗ר <WH5608> the scribe וְאֵת֙ <WH853> זִקְנֵ֣י <WH2205> and the elders הַכֹּֽהֲנִ֔ים <WH3548> of the priests מִתְכַּסִּ֖ים <WH3680> covered בַּשַּׂקִּ֑ים <WH8242> with sackcloth אֶל־ <WH413> to יְשַֽׁעְיָ֥הוּ <WH3470> to Isaiah הַנָּבִ֖יא <WH5030> the prophet בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son אָמֽוֹץ׃ <WH531> of Amoz

וַיֹּאמְר֣וּ <WH559> And they said אֵלָ֗יו <WH413> to him כֹּ֚ה <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֣ר <WH559> unto him Thus saith חִזְקִיָּ֔הוּ <WH2396> Hezekiah יוֹם־ <WH3117> This day צָרָ֧ה <WH6869> of trouble וְתוֹכֵחָ֛ה <WH8433> and of rebuke וּנְאָצָ֖ה <WH5007> and blasphemy הַיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> [is] a day הַזֶּ֑ה <WH2088> This כִּ֣י <WH3588> for בָ֤אוּ <WH935> are come בָנִים֙ <WH1121> for the children עַד־ <WH5704> against מַשְׁבֵּ֔ר <WH4866> to the birth וְכֹ֥חַ <WH3581> and [there is] not strength אַ֖יִן <WH369> and there לְלֵדָֽה׃ <WH3205> to bring forth

אוּלַ֡י <WH194> It may be יִשְׁמַע֩ <WH8085> will hear יְהוָ֨ה <WH3068> the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֜יךָ <WH430> thy God אֵ֣ת ׀ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all דִּבְרֵ֣י <WH1697> all the words רַב־ שָׁקֵ֗ה <WH7262> of Rabshakeh אֲשֶׁר֩ <WH834> whom שְׁלָח֨וֹ <WH7971> hath sent מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> whom the king אַשּׁ֤וּר ׀ <WH804> of Assyria אֲדֹנָיו֙ <WH113> his master לְחָרֵף֙ <WH2778> to reproach אֱלֹהִ֣ים <WH430> God חַ֔י <WH2416> the living וְהוֹכִ֙יחַ֙ <WH3198> and will reprove בַּדְּבָרִ֔ים <WH1697> the words אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which שָׁמַ֖ע <WH8085> hath heard יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> which the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֑יךָ <WH430> thy God וְנָשָׂ֣אתָ <WH5375> wherefore lift up תְפִלָּ֔ה <WH8605> [thy] prayer בְּעַ֥ד <WH1157> for הַשְּׁאֵרִ֖ית <WH7611> for the remnant הַנִּמְצָאָֽה׃ <WH4672> that are left
וַיָּבֹ֗אוּ <WH935> came עַבְדֵ֛י <WH5650> So the servants הַמֶּ֥לֶךְ <WH4428> of king חִזְקִיָּ֖הוּ <WH2396> Hezekiah אֶל־ <WH413> to יְשַֽׁעַיָֽהוּ׃ <WH3470> to Isaiah

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said לָהֶם֙ יְשַֽׁעְיָ֔הוּ <WH3470> And Isaiah כֹּ֥ה <WH3541> Thus תֹאמְר֖וּן <WH559> unto them Thus shall ye say אֶל־ <WH413> to אֲדֹֽנֵיכֶ֑ם <WH113> to your master כֹּ֣ה ׀ <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֣ר <WH559> Thus saith יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> the LORD אַל־ <WH408> not תִּירָא֙ <WH3372> Be not afraid מִפְּנֵ֤י <WH6440> of הַדְּבָרִים֙ <WH1697> the words אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which שָׁמַ֗עְתָּ <WH8085> which thou hast heard אֲשֶׁ֧ר <WH834> which גִּדְּפ֛וּ <WH1442> have blasphemed נַעֲרֵ֥י <WH5288> with which the servants מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> of the king אַשּׁ֖וּר <WH804> of Assyria אֹתִֽי׃ <WH853>

הִנְנִ֨י <WH2005> behold נֹתֵ֥ן <WH5414> Behold I will send בּוֹ֙ ר֔וּחַ <WH7307> a blast וְשָׁמַ֥ע <WH8085> upon him and he shall hear שְׁמוּעָ֖ה <WH8052> a rumour וְשָׁ֣ב <WH7725> and shall return לְאַרְצ֑וֹ <WH776> to his own land וְהִפַּלְתִּ֥יו <WH5307> and I will cause him to fall בַּחֶ֖רֶב <WH2719> by the sword בְּאַרְצֽוֹ׃ <WH776> in his own land

וַיָּ֙שָׁב֙ <WH7725> returned רַב־ שָׁקֵ֔ה <WH7262> So Rabshakeh וַיִּמְצָא֙ <WH4672> and found אֶת־ <WH853> מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> the king אַשּׁ֔וּר <WH804> of Assyria נִלְחָ֖ם <WH3898> warring עַל־ <WH5921> against לִבְנָ֑ה <WH3841> against Libnah כִּ֣י <WH3588> for שָׁמַ֔ע <WH8085> for he had heard כִּ֥י <WH3588> the king נָסַ֖ע <WH5265> that he was departed מִלָּכִֽישׁ׃ <WH3923> from Lachish

וַיִּשְׁמַ֗ע <WH8085> And when he heard אֶל־ <WH413> concerning תִּרְהָ֤קָה <WH8640> of Tirhakah מֶֽלֶך־ <WH4428> king כּוּשׁ֙ <WH3568> of Ethiopia לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> say הִנֵּ֥ה <WH2009> Behold יָצָ֖א <WH3318> Behold he is come out לְהִלָּחֵ֣ם <WH3898> to fight אִתָּ֑ךְ <WH854> against וַיָּ֙שָׁב֙ <WH7725> again וַיִּשְׁלַ֣ח <WH7971> against thee he sent מַלְאָכִ֔ים <WH4397> messengers אֶל־ <WH413> concerning חִזְקִיָּ֖הוּ <WH2396> unto Hezekiah לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

כֹּ֣ה <WH3541> Thus תֹאמְר֗וּן <WH559> Thus shall ye speak אֶל־ <WH413> to חִזְקִיָּ֤הוּ <WH2396> to Hezekiah מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> king יְהוּדָה֙ <WH3063> of Judah לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> saying אַל־ <WH408> nay יַשִּׁאֲךָ֣ <WH5377> deceive אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <WH430> Let not thy God אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> whom אַתָּ֛ה <WH859> you בֹּטֵ֥חַ <WH982> in whom thou trustest בּ֖וֹ לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> thee saying לֹ֤א <WH3808> not תִנָּתֵן֙ <WH5414> shall not be delivered יְר֣וּשָׁלִַ֔ם <WH3389> Jerusalem בְּיַ֖ד <WH3027> into the hand מֶ֥לֶךְ <WH4428> of the king אַשּֽׁוּר׃ <WH804> of Assyria

הִנֵּ֣ה ׀ <WH2009> Behold אַתָּ֣ה <WH859> you שָׁמַ֗עְתָּ <WH8085> Behold thou hast heard אֵת֩ <WH853> אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> what עָשׂ֜וּ <WH6213> have done מַלְכֵ֥י <WH4428> what the kings אַשּׁ֛וּר <WH804> of Assyria לְכָל־ <WH3605> to all הָאֲרָצ֖וֹת <WH776> to all lands לְהַֽחֲרִימָ֑ם <WH2763> by destroying them utterly וְאַתָּ֖ה <WH859> and shalt תִּנָּצֵֽל׃ <WH5337> and shalt thou be delivered

הַהִצִּ֨ילוּ <WH5337> delivered אֹתָ֜ם <WH853> אֱלֹהֵ֤י <WH430> Have the gods הַגּוֹיִם֙ <WH1471> of the nations אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which שִׁחֲת֣וּ <WH7843> have destroyed אֲבוֹתַ֔י <WH1> them which my fathers אֶת־ <WH853> גּוֹזָ֖ן <WH1470> [as] Gozan וְאֶת־ <WH853> חָרָ֑ן <WH2771> and Haran וְרֶ֥צֶף <WH7530> and Rezeph וּבְנֵי־ <WH1121> and the children עֶ֖דֶן <WH5729> of Eden אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> who בִּתְלַאשָּֽׂר׃ <WH8515> Telassar

אַיּ֤וֹ <WH335> Where מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> Where [is] the king חֲמָת֙ <WH2574> of Hamath וּמֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> and the king אַרְפָּ֔ד <WH774> of Arpad וּמֶ֖לֶךְ <WH4428> and the king לָעִ֣יר <WH5892> of the city סְפַרְוָ֑יִם <WH5617> of Sepharvaim הֵנַ֖ע <WH2012> of Hena וְעִוָּֽה׃ <WH5755> Ava

וַיִּקַּ֨ח <WH3947> received חִזְקִיָּ֧הוּ <WH2396> And Hezekiah אֶת־ <WH853> הַסְּפָרִ֛ים <WH5612> the letter מִיַּ֥ד <WH3027> of the hand הַמַּלְאָכִ֖ים <WH4397> of the messengers וַיִּקְרָאֵ֑ם <WH7121> and read וַיַּ֙עַל֙ <WH5927> went up בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> into the house יְהוָ֔ה <WH3069> God וַיִּפְרְשֵׂ֥הוּ <WH6566> and spread חִזְקִיָּ֖הוּ <WH2396> it and Hezekiah לִפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> it before יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3069> God פ

וַיִּתְפַּלֵּ֨ל <WH6419> prayed חִזְקִיָּ֜הוּ <WH2396> And Hezekiah לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> before יְהוָה֮ <WH3068> the LORD וַיֹּאמַר֒ <WH559> and said יְהוָ֞ה <WH3068> O LORD אֱלֹהֵ֤י <WH430> God יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> of Israel יֹשֵׁ֣ב <WH3427> which dwellest הַכְּרֻבִ֔ים <WH3742> [between] the cherubims אַתָּה־ <WH859> you ה֤וּא <WH1931> You הָֽאֱלֹהִים֙ <WH430> thou art the God לְבַדְּךָ֔ <WH905> alone לְכֹ֖ל <WH3605> of all מַמְלְכ֣וֹת <WH4467> [even] thou alone of all the kingdoms הָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> of the earth אַתָּ֣ה <WH859> You עָשִׂ֔יתָ <WH6213> thou hast made אֶת־ <WH853> הַשָּׁמַ֖יִם <WH8064> heaven וְאֶת־ <WH853> הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> and earth

הַטֵּ֨ה <WH5186> bow down יְהוָ֤ה ׀ <WH3068> LORD אָזְנְךָ֙ <WH241> thine ear וּֽשֲׁמָ֔ע <WH8085> and hear פְּקַ֧ח <WH6491> open יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> LORD עֵינֶ֖יךָ <WH5869> thine eyes וּרְאֵ֑ה <WH7200> and see וּשְׁמַ֗ע <WH8085> and hear אֵ֚ת <WH853> דִּבְרֵ֣י <WH1697> the words סַנְחֵרִ֔יב <WH5576> of Sennacherib אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which שְׁלָח֔וֹ <WH7971> which hath sent לְחָרֵ֖ף <WH2778> him to reproach אֱלֹהִ֥ים <WH430> God חָֽי׃ <WH2416> the living

אָמְנָ֖ם <WH551> Of a truth יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> LORD הֶחֱרִ֜יבוּ <WH2717> have destroyed מַלְכֵ֥י <WH4428> the kings אַשּׁ֛וּר <WH804> of Assyria אֶת־ <WH853> הַגּוֹיִ֖ם <WH1471> the nations וְאֶת־ <WH853> אַרְצָֽם׃ <WH776> and their lands

וְנָתְנ֥וּ <WH5414> And have cast אֶת־ <WH853> אֱלֹהֵיהֶ֖ם <WH430> their gods בָּאֵ֑שׁ <WH784> into the fire כִּי֩ <WH3588> for לֹ֨א <WH3808> were not אֱלֹהִ֜ים <WH430> for they [were] no gods הֵ֗מָּה <WH1992> like כִּ֣י <WH3588> for אִם־ <WH518> but מַעֲשֵׂ֧ה <WH4639> but the work יְדֵֽי־ <WH3027> hands אָדָ֛ם <WH120> of men's עֵ֥ץ <WH6086> wood וָאֶ֖בֶן <WH68> and stone וַֽיְאַבְּדֽוּם׃ <WH6> therefore they have destroyed

וְעַתָּה֙ <WH6258> Now יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Now therefore O LORD אֱלֹהֵ֔ינוּ <WH430> our God הוֹשִׁיעֵ֥נוּ <WH3467> I beseech thee save נָ֖א <WH4994> pray מִיָּד֑וֹ <WH3027> thou us out of his hand וְיֵֽדְעוּ֙ <WH3045> may know כָּל־ <WH3605> all מַמְלְכ֣וֹת <WH4467> that all the kingdoms הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> of the earth כִּ֥י <WH3588> for אַתָּ֛ה <WH859> O יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> that thou [art] the LORD אֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> God לְבַדֶּֽךָ׃ <WH905> you alone ס

וַיִּשְׁלַח֙ <WH7971> sent יְשַֽׁעְיָ֣הוּ <WH3470> Then Isaiah בֶן־ <WH1121> the son אָמ֔וֹץ <WH531> of Amoz אֶל־ <WH413> about חִזְקִיָּ֖הוּ <WH2396> to Hezekiah לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> saying כֹּֽה־ <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֤ר <WH559> Thus saith יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> God יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> Because הִתְפַּלַּ֧לְתָּ <WH6419> [That] which thou hast prayed אֵלַ֛י <WH413> about אֶל־ <WH413> about סַנְחֵרִ֥ב <WH5576> to me against Sennacherib מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> king אַשּׁ֖וּר <WH804> of Assyria שָׁמָֽעְתִּי׃ <WH8085> I have heard

זֶ֣ה <WH2088> This הַדָּבָ֔ר <WH1697> This [is] the word אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after דִּבֶּ֥ר <WH1696> hath spoken יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> that the LORD עָלָ֑יו <WH5921> against בָּזָ֨ה <WH959> hath despised לְךָ֜ לָעֲגָ֣ה <WH3932> thee [and] laughed thee to scorn לְךָ֗ בְּתוּלַת֙ <WH1330> concerning him The virgin בַּת־ <WH1323> the daughter צִיּ֔וֹן <WH6726> of Zion אַחֲרֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH310> at thee רֹ֣אשׁ <WH7218> her head הֵנִ֔יעָה <WH5128> hath shaken בַּ֖ת <WH1323> the daughter יְרוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <WH3389> of Jerusalem

אֶת־ <WH853> מִ֤י <WH4310> Whom חֵרַ֙פְתָּ֙ <WH2778> Whom hast thou reproached וְגִדַּ֔פְתָּ <WH1442> and blasphemed וְעַל־ <WH5921> and מִ֖י <WH4310> whom הֲרִימ֣וֹתָ <WH7311> ? and against whom hast thou exalted קּ֑וֹל <WH6963> [thy] voice וַתִּשָּׂ֥א <WH5375> and lifted up מָר֛וֹם <WH4791> and haughtily עֵינֶ֖יךָ <WH5869> thine eyes עַל־ <WH5921> and קְד֥וֹשׁ <WH6918> the Holy יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> [One] of Israel
